main.name: Victor Polisetty
main.description: As I near graduation, I am seeking full-time software engineering roles where I can apply my diverse skill set. For collaboration or opportunities, please contact me at victorpolisetty@gmail.com
main.bio: As an aspiring software engineer, my technical skills in engineering and economics drive me to solve business challenges using technologies like web3, blockchain, and AI. I've demonstrated entrepreneurial initiative by launching Gator Bazaar, a full-stack iOS application with over 300+ downloads, and delving into blockchain through open source projects using Solidity, the Autonolas protocol, and Uniswap.
main.contactmessage: Want to reach out? Feel free to send me a message!

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science (minor in economics)
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Programming 1 (Java), Programming 2 (C++), Data Structures & Algorithms, Algorithm Abstraction & Design, Discrete Structures, Programming Language Concepts, Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals

projects.title: Gator Bazaar
